description: This file defines Data Transfer Objects (DTOs) for notes, including request and response payloads used in operations like creating, updating, and retrieving notes.

classes.name: CreateNoteRequest
classes.description: DTO for creating a new note, including title and content fields with validation attributes.

classes.name: UpdateNoteRequest
classes.description: DTO for updating an existing note, including title and content fields with validation attributes.

classes.name: NoteResponse
classes.description: DTO for returning note data, including Id, Title, Content, CreatedAt, and UpdatedAt fields.
